item.title: CVE-2018-1090|2024-08-05T03:51:49.104Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- pulp
item.description: In Pulp before version 2.16.2, secrets are passed into override_config when triggering a task and then become readable to all users with read access on the distributor/importer. An attacker with API access can then view these secrets.

item.title: CVE-2018-10917|2024-08-05T07:54:35.610Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- pulp
item.description: pulp 2.16.x and possibly older is vulnerable to an improper path parsing. A malicious user or a malicious iso feed repository can write to locations accessible to the 'apache' user. This may lead to overwrite of published content on other iso repositories.
